channel.title: Reading on imlk's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on imlk's blog

item.title: SoK: Understanding the Prevailing Security Vulnerabilities in TrustZone-assisted TEE Systems 论文阅读
item.description: PDF version 这是一篇IEEE S&P 2020的论文，这篇文章中，作者通过分析过去几年内TrustZone的TEE有关的上百个漏洞，分析存在的安全问题。 列举

item.title: [arxiv cs.DC]Safe and Practical GPU Acceleration in TrustZone 论文阅读
item.description: Links arxiv cs.DC 2021-11-04 https://arxiv.org/pdf/2111.03065.pdf 主要内容 Problem GPU软件栈过大（数十MB）、部分代码依赖于POSIX层 移植GPU软件栈工程量大、使TCB膨胀、引入新的安全问题 将运算外

item.title: OP-TEE: Open Portable TEE 概念梳理
item.description: Links https://www.trustedfirmware.org/ Linaro的介绍可信固件的网页 https://www.op-tee.org/ OP-TEE官网 https://github.com/OP-TEE/ OP-TEE仓库 https://optee.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ 文档 https://www.kernel.org/doc/html/latest/staging/tee.html Linux TEE subsystem Overview Architecture (in ARMv8) Definition CA：Client Application TA：Trusted Applcation T

item.title: [RECON Montreal 2019] The Road to Qualcomm TrustZone Apps Fuzzing 文章阅读
item.description: https://research.checkpoint.com/2019/the-road-to-qualcomm-trustzone-apps-fuzzing/ https://cfp.recon.cx/media/tz_apps_fuzz.pdf tz_apps_fuzz.pdf Abstract 作者的目标是对trustlet的command handler函数进行AFL测试。 作者设计了一个loader程序，可以在Android

item.title: [useuix sec20]PartEmu: Enabling Dynamic Analysis of Real-World TrustZone SoftwareUsing Emulation 论文阅读

item.title: TrustZone for Armv8-A 概念梳理
item.description: TrustZone for Armv8-A Links https://developer.arm.com/architectures/learn-the-architecture/trustzone-for-aarch64 key points EL3在任何时候都应该被归类于Secure state的一部分 地址空间 S.EL0/1和NS.EL0/1分别属于两个不同且独立的虚

item.title: SANCTUARY: ARMing TrustZone with User-space Enclaves 论文阅读
